item.title: 波音和空客即将在中国签订的大额合同使 Comac 再次倒退
item.description: 中国在汽车和火车方面的工业技术已成功赶上或超过西方。【原文：China has succeeded in matching or surpassing Western industrial technology in cars and trains.】

item.title: SEBI 可能再次调整衍生品，期权交易员惶惶不安
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 智利地震后面临潜在海啸波风险
item.description: 连接大西洋和太平洋的水体发生大地震后，智利沿海地区面临海啸的危险。【原文：Coastal regions of Chile are at risk of tsunami waves after a large earthquake in the body of water that connects the Atlantic and Pacific oceans.】

item.title: 经济刺激预期升温，中国主要银行和碧桂园受阻
item.description: 中国工商银行股份有限公司、中国建设银行股份有限公司、中国农业银行股份有限公司和中国银行股份有限公司的盈利可能受到政府刺激措施有限和经济低迷导致贷款需求疲软的影响。【原文：Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd., China Construction Bank Corp., Agricultural Bank of China Ltd. and Bank of China Ltd. probably saw earnings impacted by weaker loan demand amid limited government stimulus and a sluggish economy.】

item.title: 读卖新闻》称日本将把 26 财年暂定税率定为 17 年来的最高点
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，日本财务省计划将下一财年的政府债券利息支付率暂定为 2.6%，为 17 年来最高水平。【原文：Japan’s Finance Ministry plans to set the provisional rate for interest payments on government bonds at 2.6% for the next fiscal year, the highest level in 17 years, according to a local media report.】

item.title: 新西兰央行首席经济学家警告降息后经济刺激过度
item.description: 新西兰储备银行首席经济学家保罗-康威（Paul Conway）表示，新西兰储备银行并不需要采取过于刺激的政策，因为它认为近期经济活动的低迷是暂时的。【原文：The Reserve Bank of New Zealand doesn’t need to be too stimulatory with policy because it views the recent lull in economic activity as temporary, according to Chief Economist Paul Conway.】

item.title: 台湾资本流动瞬息万变，货币稳定面临风险
item.description: 台湾第二季度跨境资本流动的严重分化正在引发本币波动加剧的前景。【原文：A wild divergence in Taiwan’s cross-border capital flows in the second quarter is raising the prospect of higher volatility in the local dollar.】

item.title: OpenAI 人力资源主管朱莉娅-维拉格拉将离职
item.description: OpenAI 首席人事官朱莉娅-维拉格拉（Julia Villagra）将于本周五离开这家人工智能公司，在人工智能行业争相吸引人才之际，她将辞去这一重要职位。【原文：OpenAI Chief People Officer Julia Villagra is leaving the artificial intelligence company effective Friday, vacating a key role at a time when the AI industry is scrambling to attract talent.】

item.title: Meta 在计划放缓招聘之际挖来苹果人工智能高管
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Meta Platforms 公司正在招聘苹果公司的另一名人工智能高管，尽管这家社交网络公司正准备放慢招聘步伐。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is hiring another key Apple Inc. artificial intelligence executive, even as the social networking company prepares to slow its recruitment, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普不会通过美国投资计划寻求芯片制造商入股
item.description: 一位美国官员表示，特朗普政府不会寻求入股台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司和美光科技公司等正在增加美国投资的芯片制造商，而入股英特尔公司的谈判仍在继续。【原文：The Trump administration will not seek equity stakes in chipmakers like Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. and Micron Technology Inc. that are boosting their US investments, as talks continue on taking a stake in Intel Corp., a US official said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚销售增长放缓，古兹曼-戈麦斯公司股价暴跌
item.description: 自去年在悉尼上市以来，Guzman y Gomez Ltd.的股价跌幅最大，因为这家墨西哥主题快餐连锁店表示其澳大利亚餐厅的销售放缓。【原文：Shares of Guzman y Gomez Ltd. tumbled by the most since its Sydney listing last year after the Mexican-themed fast-food chain flagged a sales slowdown in its Australian restaurants.】

item.title: 马斯克试图拉拢扎克伯格为竞购 OpenAI 融资
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在一份法庭文件中说，他今年曾试图争取马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）主动收购 OpenAI。【原文：Elon Musk tried to enlist Mark Zuckerberg for his unsolicited bid to buy OpenAI this year, the startup said in a court filing.】

item.title: 麦格理为印度电动汽车租赁平台融资 4.05 亿美元
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）的基础设施资产管理部门已从多家全球基金筹集到资金，用于其在印度的电动汽车融资平台。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd.’s infrastructure asset management arm has raised money from a clutch of global funds for its electric vehicle financing platform in India.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话前交易员降低降息押注，黄金走势低迷
item.description: 在美联储杰克逊霍尔研讨会召开之前，交易商降低了对降息的押注，美国强劲的制造业数据加剧了决策者对通胀的担忧，黄金因此持稳。【原文：Gold was steady as traders lowered their bets on rate cuts ahead of the Federal Reserve’s symposium at Jackson Hole, as strong US manufacturing data added to policymakers’ concerns over inflation.】

item.title: 在人工智能竞赛中，Meta 与谷歌签署了价值 100 亿美元的云计算协议
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Meta Platforms 公司已同意与 Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司就云计算服务达成一项价值至少 100 亿美元的交易，这也是这家社交媒体巨头在人工智能领域疯狂投资的一部分。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has agreed to a deal worth at least $10 billion with Alphabet Inc.’s Google for cloud computing services, according to people familiar with the matter, part of the social media giant’s spending spree on artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 酝酿纳斯达克两地上市计划后，Zip 股票在悉尼飙升
item.description: 澳大利亚数字支付平台Zip Co.表示正在考虑在纳斯达克两地上市，以此推动其在主要增长市场的扩张，周五Zip Co.的股价一度大涨24%。【原文：Zip Co. shares jumped as much as 24% on Friday after the Australian digital payments platform said it was considering a dual listing on the Nasdaq, as part of its push to expand in its key growth market.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔会议上，债券市场降息押注面临鲍威尔的反思
item.description: 在周五备受瞩目的杰罗姆-鲍威尔讲话中，债券投资者主要预期美联储主席将表示决策者将在下个月开始降息。【原文：Bond investors are heading into Friday’s much-anticipated Jerome Powell speech largely expecting the Federal Reserve chair will indicate policymakers will start cutting interest rates next month.】

item.title: 美联储杰克逊霍尔会议正在进行中：以下是您的期待
item.description: 由堪萨斯城联储在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔主办的美联储年会于周四晚间开始，从世界各地飞来的央行行长、经济学家和记者共进晚餐。以下是为期三天的会议的预期内容：【原文：The Federal Reserve’s annual conference, hosted by the Kansas City Fed in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, began Thursday evening with a dinner for the central bankers, economists and journalists who have flown in from around the world. Here’s what to expect from the three-day gathering:】

item.title: 纳瓦罗抨击印度购买俄罗斯石油，50% 的关税迫在眉睫
item.description: 白宫贸易顾问彼得-纳瓦罗（Peter Navarro）抨击印度继续购买俄罗斯石油，并表示他预计下周将按计划对从这个南亚国家进口的石油征收 50%的惩罚性关税。【原文：White House trade adviser Peter Navarro blasted India for continuing to buy Russian oil and said he expects punitive tariffs of 50% on imports from the South Asian nation to kick in as planned next week.】

item.title: 油价保持稳定，关注关税提升前的印俄贸易
item.description: 特朗普政府的一位官员在预期的关税上调之前加大了对贸易的批评力度，市场权衡了俄罗斯原油流向印度的前景，石油市场因此保持稳定。【原文：Oil was steady as the market weighed the outlook for Russian crude flows to India after a Trump administration official ramped up his criticism over the trade ahead of an expected tariff increase.】

item.title: 日本通胀放缓，但仍远高于日本央行的目标
item.description: 即使物价增长放缓，日本消费者通胀率仍远远高于日本央行的目标，这支持了市场对日本央行今年将再次上调基准利率的猜测。【原文：The pace of Japan’s consumer inflation stayed well above the Bank of Japan’s target even as price growth moderated, supporting market speculation that the central bank will hike its benchmark interest rate again this year.】

item.title: 财报重燃投资者热情，中国 Z 世代股票再度飙升
item.description: 在强劲盈利和年轻消费者狂热需求的推动下，受 Z 世代欢迎的中国公司股票再次飙升。【原文：Stocks of Chinese companies popular with Gen Z are surging again, fueled by robust earnings and fervent demand of young consumers.】

item.title: HPS 领导的集团接近达成购买 22 亿美元 LBO 债务的协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，HPS Investment Partners 和包括阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：HPS Investment Partners and a group of lenders, including Apollo Global Management Inc., are snapping up over $2.2 billion of buyout debt that had been stuck on bank balance sheets since the Trump Administration’s tariff proposals disrupted markets earlier this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 电子商务公司 Pattern 据称将寻求在 9 月前提交 IPO 文件
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在亚马逊公司等市场上转售商品的电子商务公司 Pattern Inc.【原文：Pattern Inc., an e-commerce firm that resells goods on marketplaces such as Amazon.com Inc.’s, is set to file for a US initial public offering before the start of September, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大众超市、医疗保健股领跑恒生指数
item.description: 分析师称，恒生指数有限公司可能会将Labubu玩偶制造商Pop Mart International Group Ltd.和几家医疗保健公司纳入其港股基准。【原文：Hang Seng Indexes Co. is likely adding Labubu doll-maker Pop Mart International Group Ltd. and several health-care firms to its Hong Kong stock benchmark, analysts say.】

item.title: 港元套利交易因融资成本飙升而 "终结
item.description: 香港利率的飙升正在颠覆今年早些时候世界上最好的套利交易，此前，地方当局设计了现金紧缩措施，以缓解香港数十年货币联系汇率的压力。【原文：A surge in Hong Kong interest rates is upending what was the world’s best carry trade earlier this year, after local authorities engineered a cash squeeze to ease pressure on the city’s decades-old currency peg.】

item.title: 精神航空借贷 2.75 亿美元避免银行卡支付中断
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines Inc. ）通过循环信用贷款借贷了 2.75 亿美元，以避免迫在眉睫的现金紧缺，因为现金紧缺曾威胁到该公司接受客户信用卡付款的能力。【原文：Spirit Airlines Inc. borrowed $275 million via a revolving credit facility to avert a looming cash crunch that had threatened to cut off the company’s ability to accept credit card payments from customers.】

item.title: 交易员减少降息押注，股票和债券下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街股市和债券下跌后，亚洲股市开盘后变化不大，因为交易商减少了对美联储即将降息的押注。【原文：Asian equities were primed to open little changed after stocks and bonds fell on Wall Street as traders trimmed bets on imminent Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 交易员减少降息押注，股票和债券下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在美国股市和债券下跌之后，亚洲股市开盘表现平淡，因为交易商减少了对美联储即将降息的押注。【原文：Asian equities looked set for a muted open after US stocks and bonds fell as traders pared back wagers on imminent Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: Aspiration Partners 的约瑟夫-桑伯格承认诈骗 2.48 亿美元
item.description: 一家气候金融初创公司曾估值超过 20 亿美元，并得到了众多知名人士的支持，该公司的联合创始人在同意承认自己欺诈了多名投资者和贷款人之后，将面临牢狱之灾。【原文：The co-founder of a climate-finance startup once valued at more than $2 billion and backed by a slate of high-profile celebrities faces prison after agreeing to admit he defrauded multiple investors and lenders.】
